title: Workplace recognizes Maria's professional care work in medical field
description: Workplace recognizes Maria's professional care work in medical field
content:
Scenario: Workplace recognizes Maria's professional care work in medical field
    Given Maria's medical assistant work is professional caregiving
    And she provides paid care work while also doing unpaid care at home
    When Maria's professional contributions are assessed
    Then the workplace_elohim should recognize her medical work as care labor
    And her professional caregiving should be valued in care economy framework
    And she should see her career as care economy participation, not separate from it
    And care economy should include professional care work, not just household labor
    And Maria's dual care roles should both be recognized and valued
